name: Argentavis
description: Large, strong flyer capable of carrying heavy loads and medium creatures.

name: Daeodon
description: Aggressive scavenger that gains health and speed when consuming corpses.

name: Fire Wyvern
description: Balanced wrath of flame; excels at area damage and has fire resistance.

name: Giganotosaurus
description: Massive carnivore with colossal damage and reach; among the strongest land predators.

name: Griffin
description: Aerial predator with powerful dive attacks and aerial agility.

name: Ice Wyvern
description: Breathes a freezing blast that slows or freezes targets; ideal for crowd control.

name: Lightning Wyvern
description: Wyvern variant that unleashes a lightning beam whose damage scales with melee; high burst but heavy stamina drain.

name: Mantis
description: Giant insect with grappling claws, toxic ranged spit, and mounted weapon capability.

name: Mosasaurus
description: Giant marine predator with crushing jaws—dominates underwater combat.

name: Otter
description: Cute aquatic creature that forages underwater and can produce a special resource.

name: Ovis
description: Docile sheep-like creature useful for wool gathering and festive events.

name: Phoenix
description: A mythical bird of fire and rebirth, the Phoenix is said to burst into flames upon death, only to rise anew from its own ashes. Known for its radiant plumage, searing heat, and unmatched grace in flight, it is a symbol of immortality and renewal in countless legends.

name: Poison Wyvern
description: Shoots long-range toxic projectiles that ignore armor and deal damage over time.

name: Purlovia
description: Burrowing scorpion-like predator that ambushes prey from below.

name: Quetzalcoatlus
description: The largest flying creature; prized as a mobile air-base and massive transporter when tamed.

name: Raptor
description: Fast and agile pack hunter; excels at hit-and-run attacks.

name: Rex
description: The classic apex predator—enormous health, raw melee power, and a fearsome presence in combat.

name: Rock Drake
description: Stealthy flyer that can cling to walls and glide—ideal for infiltration and mobility.

name: Rock Elemental
description: A golem disguised as a boulder; harvests stone and throws it—valuable for siege tactics.

name: Snow Owl
description: A nocturnal predator that can reduce target’s torpor and has a freezing breath.

name: Therizinosaur
description: Versatile bipedal beast capable of harvesting resources and dealing damage with scythes.

name: Thylacoleo
description: Ambush predator with strong pounce and grappling ability; excels in quick strikes.

name: Triceratops
description: Heavy-horned herbivore with powerful charge attacks and great stamina.

name: Troodon
description: Small, pack-hunting raptor with high intelligence and torpor-based attacks.

name: Unicorn
description: A horse-like, magical creature capable of granting spectral or healing effects to riders.

name: Wyvern
description: A massive dragon-like reptile with elemental breath and the ability to carry riders; must be hatched from an egg and raised.
